title: Unable to Gift Boosts?
body:
I bought some RP so I could purchase a friend an Exp Boost so they can hurry up and hit 30. 

After purchasing the RP and going to Gift said item, I noticed much to my dismay that you cannot gift Boosts... Is there anyway to gift a boost??? I{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Boosts aren't currently eligible for gifting.  You can see our Gifting FAQ here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ

> [{quoted}](name=Hollymonster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=blKmMrou,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-09T19:47:23.296+0000)
>
> Boosts aren't currently eligible for gifting.  You can see our Gifting FAQ here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ

Sad days :(

Is there anyway I can give them RP I already have purchased? Like, take some RP, throw it in a sack, and send it to them? {{summoner:12}}

While putting RP into a sack and throwing it at someone creates an interesting visual for me, there isn't a way to gift current RP.

Sorry.  :(
